entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is worried about his mother and concerned about strange occurrences.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's friend and godfather, whom Harry has written to for help and support.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is mentioned as having left his mark in the sky.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and relatives, who is sleeping nearby and whose snores help Harry fall asleep.

relationships.description: Harry has written a letter to Sirius for help and support, as mentioned in the text: 'He thought of the letter he had written to Sirius before leaving Privet Drive.'
Harry is concerned about Lord Voldemort's mark in the sky, as mentioned in the text: 'What did these things mean?'
Harry is near Charlie, who is sleeping nearby and whose snores help Harry fall asleep.
